text:
2 PhD вакансии в нашей evolutionary algorithms лабе (я сам PhD студент), формально одна в CWI Amsterdam, одна в LUMC Leiden но работают все равно все вместе.

- зп net примерно 2200 € в первый год, во второй уже 2500, + транспорт
- достаточно большая свобода чем заниматься: можно разрабатывать explainable deep learning методы и придумать как использовать готовые evolutionary algorithms (nas например), можно непосредственно углубиться в них, включая genetic programming
- кроме разработки новых методов важно практическое применение - будут реальные данные из клиники

<https://www.cwi.nl/jobs/vacancies/ph-d-students-on-a-joint-project-on-the-development-of-evolutionary-machine-learning-techniques-for-explainable-ai-and-their-application-to-medical-data|https://www.cwi.nl/jobs/vacancies/ph-d-students-on-a-joint-project-on-the-development-of-evolutionary-machine-learning-techniques-for-explainable-ai-and-their-application-to-medical-data>

attachments.title: PhD students  on a joint project on the development of evolutionary machine learning techniques for explainable AI and their application to medical data.
attachments.text: The Dutch national research institute for mathematics and computer science (CWI, Centrum Wiskunde & Informatica) located in Amsterdam, and the Leiden University Medical Center (LUMC) together have 2 vacancies for fully funded PhD students, on a joint project on the development of evolutionary machine learning techniques for explainable AI and their application to medical data.
attachments.fallback: CWI: PhD students  on a joint project on the development of evolutionary machine learning techniques for explainable AI and their application to medical data.

elements.text:
